refnamediv.refpurpose: Syncronize your Palm ToDo application's database with your desktop machine.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: read-todos will read the ToDo database on the Palm handheld, or read the ToDoDB.pdb file directly from disk on your desktop machine, and print the contents to STDOUT (generally the screen).

blockquote.para: Save ToDO entries in file instead of STDOUT
Write archived entries only, in human-readable format

Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld device. If this is not specified, read-todos will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, read-todos will print the usage information.
Display version of read-todos and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for read-todos and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: Connect to a target Palm handheld and read the ToDo database, or read the ToDoDB.pdb file from disk and print the entries found to STDOUT.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Read the on-Palm ToDo database, and dump to STDOUT.
Read the ToDoDB.pdb file on disk, and dump to STDOUT
